snippet: Melissa Rogers, a scholar of church-state legal issues, will be the new director of President Obama’s Office of Faith-Based and Neighborhood Partnerships, the White House announced Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Melissa Rogers, a scholar of church-state legal issues, will be the new director of President Obama’s Office of Faith-Based and Neighborhood Partnerships, the White House announced Wednesday.

headline.main: Director Is Chosen for Faith-Based Agency
headline.print_headline: Director Is Chosen For Faith-Based Agency
